hero.subtitle: GISPRO is your reliable partner in geographic information systems. We offer a full range of services for the development, support, and integration of GIS solutions.
hero.description: Our specialists will help you automate processes and generate analytical reports by integrating GIS into your business operations.

servicesTabs.heading: Our Services
servicesTabs.itDescription: Our team delivers turnkey IT solutions, from requirements analysis through to product support. We build user-friendly web interfaces, scalable backends, and ensure the reliability of every line of code.
servicesTabs.gisDescription: We provide a full spectrum of surveying work and implement modern GIS solutions. From topographic surveys to publishing geodata in interactive portals—ensuring accuracy and efficiency in your projects.
servicesTabs.designDescription: We specialize in master planning, residential and public building design, and infrastructure projects. Our solutions blend creative design, energy efficiency, and strict compliance with GOST and ISO standards.
servicesTabs.constructionDescription: We offer a complete cycle of construction works—from site preparation to turnkey delivery. We rely on proven materials, experienced crews, and effective project management.
servicesTabs.analyticsDescription: We offer a full range of analytical services: data collection, processing, visualization, and predictive model building to optimize your business.
servicesTabs.analyticsPoint1: Data collection and aggregation from various sources
servicesTabs.analyticsPoint2: Cleaning and preparation of large datasets

case1.title: City GIS
case1.description: An interactive city map with infrastructure overlays and analytical layers.

case2.title: Tourist Navigator
case2.description: A mobile app with offline maps, routes, and voice navigation.

case3.title: Monitoring Platform
case3.description: An online real-time monitoring system for industrial facilities.

processAnimation.heading: How We Work
processAnimation.subtext: From topographic surveying to a finished web interface—every step is transparent and clear.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.description: We develop software and execute projects utilizing advanced geotechnologies. We offer cost-effective yet sophisticated GIS solutions with reliable long-term support.

messages.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent.
messages.error: An error occurred while sending. Please try again later.

hero.subtitle: About Us
hero.title: Innovative Geospatial Solutions
hero.description: For over ten years we’ve been at the forefront of GIS technology, delivering cutting‑edge solutions for complex spatial challenges across a variety of industries.

company.title: About Our Company
company.description1: Founded in 2014 in Bishkek, our company specializes in end‑to‑end solutions for geographic information systems (GIS), land management, and architectural design.
company.description2: Over 11 years, we’ve successfully completed more than 50 projects across Kyrgyzstan: from digitizing pasture maps to creating interactive 3D maps for educational programs and strategic national‑security sites.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We develop cutting‑edge geospatial solutions that empower our clients to make informed decisions and achieve their strategic goals.
